episodes.title: Denmark Minister: “I Have No Sympathy for Jehovah’s Witnesses”
episodes.description:
Denmark has officially closed its supervisory case into Jehovah’s Witnesses — but the real story is what the minister said afterward.
In a stunning statement, the Minister of Church Affairs declared:

👉 “I have no sympathy for Jehovah’s Witnesses.”
👉 “I am positive about changing the law.”
👉 And he encouraged former and current members to report psychological abuse to the police.

This video breaks down the full Ekstra Bladet article, what Denmark actually investigated, what they didn’t look at, and why the minister says the laws may not be strong enough to deal with shunning and coercive control.

I also explain how Norway’s recent court battles showed the danger of outdated laws — and why Denmark may be preparing to tighten its legislation so harmful practices can finally be addressed properly.

This is not Denmark defending Jehovah’s Witnesses.
This is Denmark preparing the legal ground for real accountability.

📌 Original Danish article (Ekstra Bladet):
Search: “Ekstra Bladet Minister closes supervisory case Jehovah’s Witnesses”

https://ekstrabladet.dk/nyheder/samfund/ministerium-lukker-tilsynssag-mod-jehovas-vidner-jeg-har-ingen-sympati-for-dem/11018935

📌 Support & recovery resources:
www.exJWFriends.com

Ex-JW certified therapists, community support, and weekly live streams with Joe & Fran.

✍️ Tell me your thoughts in the comments — do you think Denmark will update their laws? Should psychological violence be legally defined?

As always — Live your life with love.

episodes.description:
⚠️ This may be the most dangerous JW Morning Worship talk ever released.
In this video, we examine the Watchtower’s claims clip-by-clip, revealing how they twist scripture, pressure doctors using the HLC (Hospital Liaison Committee), and promote a deadly blood doctrine that has cost countless lives.

You’ll see their own words — straight from the Morning Worship — followed by:

Biblical clarity using ONLY the JW New World Translation

Medical research showing the real danger behind blood refusal

The real meaning of scriptures like Leviticus 17:11, 1 Samuel 14, 1 Corinthians 10, and Deut. 30:19

Why Jewish law ALWAYS prioritized life over ritual

Why Jesus himself rejected legalism when lives were at stake

This doctrine has killed fathers, mothers, children…
And if left unexposed, it could take more — even someone in our own families.

If you’re waking up, or if someone you love is still inside, this information could save their life.

📘 SCRIPTURES COVERED:
• 1 Samuel 14:31–35
• 1 Corinthians 10:25–27
• Matthew 12:7
• Leviticus 17:11
• Deuteronomy 30:19

episodes.title: 🔥$100,000,000 Lawsuit Exposes Circuit Overseer Abuse & Watchtower Cover-Up
episodes.description:
⚠️ This video discusses allegations from a public federal lawsuit involving child abuse. No graphic details are described.
All information is sourced directly from the official court document filed in the Southern District of New York.
Source: 
gov.uscourts.nysd.652986.1.0
https://storage.courtlistener.com/recap/gov.uscourts.nysd.652986/gov.uscourts.nysd.652986.1.0.pdf

A $100,000,000 lawsuit has been filed against Watchtower — the controlling corporation behind Jehovah’s Witnesses — after a Circuit Overseer in Brazil was convicted of repeatedly abusing a child inside Kingdom Halls and even an Assembly Hall while thousands of Witnesses attended meetings nearby.

The lawsuit alleges:
• Repeated abuse of a 12-year-old girl by Circuit Overseer Angelo Roviezzo
• Abuse occurring inside JW properties, including the Assembly Hall
• Elders silencing her instead of protecting her
• A full-scale cover-up directed by Watchtower headquarters in New York
• The Circuit Overseer being transferred — a decision that requires New York approval
• Watchtower representatives allegedly offering money for her silence
• Roviezzo being reinstated as a Jehovah’s Witness while serving a prison sentence
• Lifelong trauma, infertility, PTSD, and multiple suicide attempts
• A jury demand for not less than $100,000,000 in damages

This case exposes the dangerous cult structure inside Jehovah’s Witnesses — a system that protects predators, silences victims, and shields leadership from accountability.

To read the full legal filing (warning: extremely graphic content):
Court Document: 

gov.uscourts.nysd.652986.1.0

episodes.title: Supreme Court vs JW.org Records: Why Ex-JWs Across Canada Should Care
episodes.description:
The Supreme Court of Canada has agreed to hear a major case involving Jehovah’s Witness congregations and their refusal to release personal records to former members. This ruling could affect every ex-JW in Canada — including anyone whose records are in another province.

In this video, Vern explains:

• What the BC case is really about
• Why JW congregations refused to disclose records
• How the BC Supreme Court ruled against the Watchtower
• Why the Supreme Court of Canada stepped in
• How this could set a national precedent for privacy rights
• What “confidential religious communication” really means
• Whether Watchtower can keep your records or use them after you request them
• Why ex-JWs may want to access their personal files
• Vern’s own story:
– Leaving the religion
– Moving congregations to let the file die
– Being labeled “demonized” years later
– Receiving a cease-and-desist
– The accusation spreading across the circuit
– Losing old friends — and even contact with his daughter

This case goes far beyond two former members.
It’s about transparency, accountability, and your legal right to know what has been written about you behind closed doors.

If you ever left Jehovah’s Witnesses — voluntarily, disfellowshipped, disassociated, faded, or transferred congregations — this affects you.

🔔 Subscribe for updates as this case moves forward.
💬 Share in the comments: Would you request your JW records?

Live your life with love.

episodes.title: Jehovah’s Witness Leader Charged With Abusing Multiple Girls — Alaska Case Ignites Outrage
episodes.description:
State prosecutors in Alaska have charged Aaron “Scott” Merritt — a former Jehovah’s Witness ministerial servant — with 20 counts of child sexual abuse involving at least four girls from the Kenai Kingdom Hall.

According to a new report from the Anchorage Daily News, members say the abuse was reported to elders years before anything was done, and that internal JW policies, secrecy, and the “two witness rule” allowed Merritt to continue abusing children throughout the 1990s and early 2000s.

In this video, I break down what the article reveals:
• How rumors and direct reports about Merritt were ignored for years  
• Why the abuse wasn’t reported to police until 2002  
• Why no charges were filed at that time  
• How JW doctrines like the two-witness rule and ‘don’t bring reproach’ culture protected the congregation over the children  
• Why the case was reopened in 2021, leading to Merritt’s indictment in late 2025  
• The long-term impact on survivors

If you’re leaving the Jehovah’s Witnesses, or you’re a survivor of child abuse inside the religion, you are not alone. Visit www.exJWFriends.com for support and resources.

Source: 
https://www.adn.com/alaska-news/crime-courts/2025/11/22/decades-of-silence-preceded-a-painful-reckoning-for-a-jehovahs-witness-congregation-on-the-kenai-peninsula/

Live your life with love.

episodes.title: Watchtower Quietly Rewrites “Peace & Security” Doctrine | Hidden February 2026 Update Exposed
episodes.description:
In this Fixing My Faith exposé, we reveal how the Governing Body quietly changed one of their oldest and most important end-times doctrines — the prophecy of “Peace and Security” from 1 Thessalonians 5:3.

For over 60 years, Jehovah’s Witnesses were taught with absolute certainty that the world’s proclamation of “Peace and Security” would happen right before the Great Tribulation. It was promoted as a final sign… the prophetic trigger Witnesses were told to watch for.

But in the February 2026 Watchtower, buried deep in Questions From Readers, the Governing Body quietly slipped in a new version of the doctrine:

Now there are two possibilities — and even they admit “we do not know for sure.”

This video compares the old doctrine vs. the new doctrine, using their own words from official JW videos and publications, including a clip from their teaching talk on 1 Thessalonians 5:3. The shift isn’t new light — it’s damage control, and it fundamentally changes the JW end-times timeline.

If you’re waking up from Jehovah’s Witnesses or need support:
🌐 www.exJWFriends.com

Free community + ex-JW certified therapists. You’re not alone.

My channels:
Fixing My Faith
Creekside Tails — RV Life Unplugged

Always remember: Live your life with love. ❤️

episodes.title: JW.org Denies Discrimination After Sweden Cuts Funding - JW Training Video on How to... LGBTQ
episodes.description:
Sweden has officially denied state funding to Jehovah’s Witnesses — and now JW.org says they will take the fight to court.
They claim Sweden “misunderstands” their beliefs and that they don’t discriminate against LGBTQ+ people.

So today, we’re putting their claim to the test.

Thanks to reporting from Sveriges Radio, and updates from researcher Larchwood, we now know:

JW.org denies discrimination

JW.org wants full church privileges

JW.org will appeal Sweden’s decision in court

And Swedish taxpayers will be footing the bill

But Watchtower’s own training video — hidden deep on JW.org — tells the real story.
It teaches Jehovah’s Witnesses how to reject LGBTQ+ rights at work and in school, while claiming “neutrality.”

This video is not random.
It’s official Watchtower instruction.

Today we show the exact clip, along with the full transcript:
Source: /mnt/data/jwbcov22_E_04_r720P.txt
(Provided under fair dealing / educational commentary)

Sweden’s ruling is simple:
If you want public money, you need to meet public equality standards.
And JW.org simply doesn’t.

I also cover the bigger question:

Why does Watchtower want church money, clergy privilege, and tax benefits…
when they refuse to call themselves a church, and attack all other churches as “Babylon the Great”?

You decide.

🔗 Sources:
• Sweden Radio Report (English): https://www.sverigesradio.se/avsnitt/teen-suspected-of-planning-is-terror-crime-in-stockholm-jehovahs-witnesses-lose-state-funding-grim-fireplace-find-in-vadstena

• Larchwood’s update on X
https://x.com/Larchwood20/status/1984623455862726886?t=aZbbhe91sAZgv4v3H2Zl5A&s=03
• JW.org official training video (“gay rights scenario”) — full transcript in this video.
https://www.jw.org/en/library/videos/#en/mediaitems/VODBiblePrinciples/pub-jwbcov22_4_VIDEO

episodes.title: The JW Blood Rule Is Not in the Bible — Here’s the Proof
episodes.description:
Thousands of Jehovah’s Witnesses still believe refusing blood is a biblical command… but the Bible says the opposite.
In this video, we break down exactly why the JW “NO BLOOD” doctrine is not based on scripture — and how it was created by Watchtower leadership in the 1940s, not by God.

📌 What we cover:
• The REAL meaning of “abstain from blood” in scripture
• Why Acts 15 was about food peace — not medical treatment
• How Paul told Christians to eat without asking questions
• David’s men eating blood to stay alive (and God did not punish them)
• Jesus teaching that mercy outranks ritual
• The timeline showing how Knorr & Fred Franz invented the modern doctrine
• How HLCs pressure even faded Witnesses in hospitals
• Why choosing life is the biblical position

If you’re waking up from this doctrine for the first time — you are not alone.
Your life matters. Your conscience matters. Your choice matters.

🙏 If you want to help me get the medical procedure I desperately need after 10 months with a catheter and kidney complications, here’s my GoFundMe:
https://gofund.me/f7c4bc0a6

Thank you from the Ridge — every share helps.

• Leaked HLC Manual Breakdown

episodes.title: The Scripture JW.org Never Showed You — Choose Life
episodes.description:
Shawna and I recorded this video because comments on the last HLC exposé showed something heartbreaking:
Even ex-Jehovah’s Witnesses — people who left 10, 15, even 20 years ago — are still being pressured in hospitals by elders, HLC members, and JW doctors.

Many have never been taught the actual scriptures on blood.
Many still fear that taking lifesaving treatment is a sin.
And far too many people have no idea what to do when the HLC walks into their hospital room.

In this video we cover:

1️⃣ The real history of the JW blood doctrine
— It didn’t come from God.
— It didn’t come from scripture.
— It came from Fred Franz and the Watchtower leadership in 1945.

2️⃣ What the Bible actually teaches about blood
Using the New World Translation — so JWs can’t dismiss it:
• Leviticus 18:5 — “Live by means of them.”
• Matthew 12 — Mercy over ritual.
• 1 Corinthians 10:25 — Paul permitted blood-filled meat.
• Deuteronomy 30:19 — “Choose life.”
• And Jesus’ condemnation of Pharisees who demand burdens that harm people.

3️⃣ The truth about the HLC structure
— How they track patients
— Pressure doctors
— Interfere with care
— And isolate people from family

4️⃣ What YOU can do if this happens to you
A step-by-step plan to protect your medical autonomy,
remove elders or HLC from your hospital room,
and ensure you receive lifesaving treatment.

You deserve life.
You deserve freedom.
You deserve the truth — not coercion.

If this helped you, please share this video.
It could save someone’s life.

— Vern & Shawna
Fixing My Faith

episodes.title: Leaked HLC Manuals Reveal How Jehovah’s Witnesses Enforce Blood Refusal
episodes.description:
In this investigation, we break down the leaked internal Hospital Liaison Committee (HLC) manuals used by Jehovah’s Witnesses around the world.
For decades, Witnesses were told the HLC was a “spiritual support” team.
But these documents reveal a structured medical-enforcement network designed to monitor, track, and influence the medical decisions of Jehovah’s Witnesses in hospitals.

Source: https://www.reddit.com/r/exjw/s/1e568Jvcpa

PART 1 exposes:

A global medical chain of command (HIS → HID → HLC → PVG)

Untrained elders inserted into medical crises

Collection and destruction of confidential medical files

Mandatory vaccines for HLC/PVG members (optics, not doctrine)

Hospital lobbying and influence-building

PR coaching and narrative control

Gender restrictions in medical contexts

Constant availability requirements

Tracking patients like organizational assets

And the truth behind the “No Blood Card” functioning as a Durable Power of Attorney

PART 2 shows what the Bible actually teaches — using the JW New World Translation only.
We break down key scriptures proving the Bible never required dying over blood, and that God consistently placed life over law.
Even the apostles rejected purity laws when survival was at stake. Jesus himself fought religious leaders who burdened people with rules that harmed life.

This video is for anyone questioning the blood doctrine, anyone with family inside the organization, and anyone who has ever felt the pressure to choose doctrine over survival.

If you are a Jehovah’s Witness struggling with this teaching, please know:
Choosing life is not a sin.
Choosing life is not disloyalty.
Choosing life is biblical.

Live your life with love.

episodes.title: JW 2025 Growth Report EXPOSED — What They Left Out
episodes.description:
In this video, we take the 2025 Governing Body Update #7 and examine it clip-by-clip — using their own words — and compare it to what is missing, what is selectively emphasized, and what the real data reveals.

As predicted earlier this week, the new Broadcast is highly polished, emotionally warm, and full of carefully selected numbers. But what’s striking is not what they said — it’s what they didn’t say.

For decades, the annual Yearbook included:
• disfellowshipping totals
• reinstatements
• inactive publishers
• irregular publishers
• congregation growth AND decline
• youth retention
• regional breakdowns
• Kingdom Hall data
• attrition
• long-term membership trends

All of that transparency ended in 2016.

Today we get only:
• publisher totals
• baptisms
• Bible study counts
• Memorial attendance
• selective “growth highlights” from developing regions

Not a single Western country — where numbers are shrinking or flat — was mentioned.

For those who want to verify the trends independently, here are the direct Pew Research links (public, non-apostate sources):

📚 Pew Research — Verify the Data Yourself
• JW has the highest turnover rate of ANY religion (66% leave):
https://www.pewresearch.org/religion/2015/05/12/chapter-2-religious-switching-and-intermarriage/

• JW youth retention only 37% (63% leave):
https://www.pewresearch.org/religion/2015/05/12/religious-switching-and-intermarriage/#religious-switching

• JW age demographics + aging membership:
https://www.pewresearch.org/religion/religious-landscape-study/religious-groups/jehovahs-witness/

• Western JW decline (U.S. landscape study):
https://www.pewresearch.org/religion/2015/05/12/americas-changing-religious-landscape/

• Modeling the future decline of strict religions:
https://www.pewresearch.org/religion/2022/12/14/modeling-the-future-of-religion-in-america/

This rebuttal isn’t about attacking individuals — it’s about examining transparency, data, and patterns.
And when an organization reports only the numbers that look good, and hides the numbers that matter, it raises important questions the public deserves to consider.

Live your life with love.
We will see you on the next video — bye for now.


👇 VERIFY EVERYTHING — Direct Pew Research Sources

episodes.title: Is Watchtower Faking Growth? | Predictions Before Friday’s JW Broadcast
episodes.description:
In this video, we break down the leaked Governing Body update circulating on Reddit, and make predictions about the upcoming JW.org broadcast expected this Friday. Based on decades of patterns, lost transparency, and independent research, we look at what Watchtower is likely to say — and what they will likely avoid.

For years the organization published detailed Yearbooks that showed real transparency: growth, decline, disfellowshipping, inactive members, reinstatements, and congregation data by country.
That stopped after 2016.
Not because they couldn’t publish it — but because the real numbers no longer matched the narrative.

This video uses publicly available data from Pew Research Center to show the REAL trends behind the scenes:

📊 Pew Research Sources (Verify for Yourself)
• JW has the highest turnover of ANY religion (66% leave):
https://www.pewresearch.org/religion/2015/05/12/chapter-2-religious-switching-and-intermarriage/

• JW youth retention is only 37% (63% leave):
https://www.pewresearch.org/religion/2015/05/12/religious-switching-and-intermarriage/#religious-switching

• JW demographics & aging membership:
https://www.pewresearch.org/religion/religious-landscape-study/religious-groups/jehovahs-witness/

• Western JW membership is flat or declining:
https://www.pewresearch.org/religion/2015/05/12/americas-changing-religious-landscape/

• Generational trends & future decline in strict religions:
https://www.pewresearch.org/religion/2022/12/14/modeling-the-future-of-religion-in-america/

We’ll revisit everything on Friday when the broadcast is released and compare our predictions with what the Governing Body actually says.

Numbers don’t lie — people do.
Truth doesn’t fear transparency.
See you Friday for the follow-up.
Live your life with love.

episodes.title: ⚡France’s MIVILUDES Targets Watchtower’s Abuse | Interview with Barbara Anderson
episodes.description:
In this powerful new development, France’s MIVILUDES — the Interministerial Mission for Vigilance and Combat Against Sectarian Deviances — is taking a firm stance against Watchtower’s coercive and abusive practices.

Veteran researcher and advocate Barbara Anderson joins Miss Usato of AVOIDJW to discuss MIVILUDES’ renewed focus on cultic control, France’s historic legal framework, and the growing international momentum toward protecting citizens from psychological abuse under the guise of religion.

From Paris to Nashville, this story bridges decades of activism — from Barbara’s 2009 meetings with French officials and the Vatican’s Don Minuti to the present day, as leaked 2025 elder letters reveal Watchtower’s growing fear of losing its religious status in France.

This is more than an interview — it’s a historic reckoning.

🗣 Featuring:
Barbara Anderson — Watchtower Documents
Miss Usato — AVOIDJW

🏛 Topics Covered:

France’s legal move to revoke JW religious status

The role of MIVILUDES in protecting human rights

Psychological coercion vs. freedom of religion

Watchtower’s manipulation and PR spin

Global implications across Europe and beyond

📚 Source:
Original article by Miss Usato — AVOIDJW.com
Published November 2, 2025

episodes.title: 🟥 Kenai Jehovah’s Witness Leader Indicted on 20 Felony Sex-Crime Charges
episodes.description:
Former Jehovah’s Witness leader Aaron ‘Scott’ Merritt of Kenai, Alaska, has been indicted on 20 felony counts of sexual abuse and assault of minors. He pleaded not guilty at his arraignment on Nov 4 2025 and is being held on $250,000 bail. The congregation where the alleged abuse occurred has since been dissolved. This report summarizes the criminal charges and ongoing investigation.

Sources: Anchorage Daily News | KDLL Public Radio
https://www.kdll.org/local-news/2025-11-04/former-kenai-church-leader-pleads-not-guilty-to-child-sex-crime-charges
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ow4_K_gCtaY


If you have information: Kenai Police Department 907-283-7879

⚖️ All suspects are presumed innocent until proven guilty in court.
